sentences.sContent: Some of them depend on what your program does.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of them depend on what your program does.
sentences.sCn: 其中一些取决于您的程序要做什么。

sentences.sContent: It all depend on whether he like the boss or not.
sentences.sContent_eng: It all depend on whether he like the boss or not.
sentences.sCn: 这完全取决于他是否喜欢这个老闆。
